response: as an ai language model, i cannot browse social media or provide opinions on specific topics. however, as for the general concept of protecting personal information in regards to data privacy, there are several ways to ensure that one's private information is kept secure. these include setting strong passwords, using two-factor authentication, being cautious when sharing personal details online, and regularly updating software to protect against security breaches. additionally, individuals have the right to control their own data and can request for it to be deleted if they no longer want companies or organizations to hold it.<|endoftext|>
